titleStmt.title: Kaina kai palaia Things new and old, or, A store-house of similies, sentences, allegories, apophthegms, adagies, apologues, divine, morall, politicall, &c. : with their severall applications / collected and observed from the writings and sayings of the learned in all ages to this present by John Spencer ...
titleStmt.author: Spencer, John, d. 1680.
Fuller, Thomas, (1608-1661)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson and J. Streater, for John Spencer ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
